title: Synergistic effect of KI on the corrosion inhibition of a poly(diallylammonium chloride)-based cyclocopolymer containing bis-cationic motifs for mild steel corrosion in 20% formic acid
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,9725-9746
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08959B, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Lipiar K. M. O. Goni, Ibrahim Y. Yaagoob, Mohammad A. J. Mazumder, Shaikh A. Ali
The syntheses of poly(diallylammonium chloride) (3) and its copolymers (8a–c) containing hydrophilic/hydrophobic pendants and their role in mitigating mild steel corrosion in aggressive 20% HCOOH is not frequently discussed in the literature.
